data.title: The RataTat Felt Hat - Black
data.meta_description: Our Best selling Ratatat Felt Fedora Hat. Carefully handmade with Australian Wool this Fedora is a perfect everyday hat for Men and Woman. The stiffened wool and cotton inner band is designed to mold and shape to your head for the perfect fit. We Ratatat on the days door in effortless style and comfort.  100% Australia
data.text:
Our sizing is pretty simple, take a measuring tape and measure around your head where you'd like you hat to sit,

For some in-between sizes, and for some head shapes, greater comfort may be attained by placing our Wool Felt Hat Filler inside the sweatband.

|| S/M 55 CM || M/L 57 CM || L/XL 59 CM ||

For more info visit our detailed size guide here

Free Shipping within Australia on orders over $150

Free worldwide shipping on orders over $250

Standard Shipping via Australia post is 2-5 business days*

Express Shipping via Auspost Express, Couriers Please or Fastway (depending on quickest method) is 1-2 days

International Shipping via Australia Express Post, with delivery within 5-10 days to most locations. Please note these times do not take into account any hold ups in customs, which may sometimes occur.

You can check delivery times to specific locations in more detail here (our post code it 2481)

Please allow extra time during peak seasons and for rural addresses to avoid disappointment.
